name: DeleteProjectTemplate
description:
Delete a specific existing project template in Asana.

Use this tool to permanently delete a specific project template in Asana by providing the template's unique identifier.

parameters.name: project_template_identifier
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the Asana project template to delete.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the project template.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: If true, outputs the response in a readable, pretty format with line breaks and indentation, mainly for debugging purposes.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.description:

parameters.name: project_template_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the project template.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the project template.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
